title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Mount Tamalpais, California
content:
Photo submitted by Daryl Yee, “At 2600 foot elevation, Mount Tamalpais is an iconic ride with vistas all around the San Francisco bay area. Our recent good weather gave us the opportunity to make the climb up ‘Tam’ and enjoy the views. Note San Francisco skyline in the distance!” We always love seeing photos from […]

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Mount Tamalpais, California appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
